trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

trans-unit.source: Each noncreature artifact you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: Each noncreature artifact you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.

trans-unit.source: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
trans-unit.target: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.

trans-unit.source: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

trans-unit.source: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
trans-unit.target: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature or player, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature or player, you gain 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·203 | Greven il-Vec | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature. It can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.source: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put it on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put it on top of your library.

trans-unit.source: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control is dealt to you instead.
trans-unit.target: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control is dealt to you instead.

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have shadow. (They can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control have shadow. (They can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.source: {0}: Untap target attacking creature you control and remove it from combat.
trans-unit.target: {0}: Untap target attacking creature you control and remove it from combat.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·306 | Sidar Kondo | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·307 | Sliver Queen, Brood Mother | Card Name
PVAN·307 | Sliver Queen, Brood Mother | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
trans-unit.target: {3}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

trans-unit.source: {3}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: If a creature you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
trans-unit.target: If a creature you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

trans-unit.source: You may cast artifact, creature, and enchantment spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: You may cast artifact, creature, and enchantment spells as though they had flash.

trans-unit.source: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
trans-unit.target: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

trans-unit.source: {3}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: {3}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
